generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including white dashed lines and a bicycle lane, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by trees and poles, and pedestrians are walking on it.
- building: Tall buildings with glass facades and architectural features are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves line the street, providing shade.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black car is visible driving in the lane ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, supporting signs or lighting fixtures.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- sky: The sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing bright and clear.
